ref.div: Borick C, Rabe BG (2003) The Fall 2012 NSEE findings report for belief-related questions. A report from the National Surveys on Energy and Environment, Center for Local, State and Urban Policy. University of Michigan. Available: http://closup.umich.edu/files/ieep-nsee-2012-fall-climate-belief.pdf. Accessed 17 May 2014.
